00015     public ChangeLogWriter(FileOpener fileOpener, File rootOutputDir) {
00016         this.outputDir = new File(rootOutputDir, "changelogs");
00017         this.fileOpener = fileOpener;
00018     }
00019 
00020     public void writeChangeLog(String changeLog, String physicalFilePath) throws IOException {
00021         InputStream stylesheet = fileOpener.getResourceAsStream(physicalFilePath);
00022         if (stylesheet == null) {
00023             throw new IOException("Can not find "+changeLog);
00024         }
00025 
00026 //        File file = outputDir;
00027 //        String[] splitPath = (changeLog.getFilePath() + ".xml").split("/");

00029 //            String pathPart = splitPath[i];
00030 //            file = new File(file, pathPart);
00031 //            if (i < splitPath.length - 1) {
00032 //                file.mkdirs();
00033 //            }
00034 //        }
00035 
00036 
00037         File xmlFile = new File(outputDir, changeLog + ".xml");
00038         xmlFile.getParentFile().mkdirs();
00039 
00040         FileOutputStream changeLogStream = new FileOutputStream(xmlFile, false);
00041         try {
00042             StreamUtil.copy(stylesheet, changeLogStream);
00043         } finally {
00044             changeLogStream.close();
00045         }
00046 
00047     }
